Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum
Enumerator
ABRT 

Abort signal, default action is to abort

ALRM 

Alarm signal, default action is to terminate

BUS 

Bus signal, default action is to abort

CHLD 

Child signal, default action is to ignore

CONT 

Continue signal, default action is to continue

FPE 

FPE signal, default action is to abort

HUP 

Hangup signal, default action is to terminate

ILL 

Illegal signal, default action is to abort

INT 

Interrupt signal, default action is to terminate

KILL 

Kill signal, default action is to terminate (cannot be caught or ignored)

PIPE 

Pipe signal, default action is to terminate

QUIT 

Quit signal, default action is to abort

SEGV 

Segmentation signal, default action is to abort

STOP 

Stop signal, default action is to stop (cannot be caught or ignored)

TERM 

Terminal signal, default action is to terminate

TSTP 

TSTP signal, default action is to stop

TTIN signal, default action is to stop

TTOU signal, default action is to stop

User signal, default action is to terminate

User signal, default action is to terminate

Poll signal, default action is to terminate
